sentences.sContent: In general, only one third of health facilities have potable water, and just one in four remain linked to the general sewerage system or to a power supply.
sentences.sContent_eng: In general, only one third of health facilities have potable water, and just one in four remain linked to the general sewerage system or to a power supply.
sentences.sCn: 一般而言，近三分之一的卫生设施有适合饮用的水，并且仅仅四分之一仍然与一般排水系统或电源连接。

sentences.sContent: Food processing converts relatively bulky, perishable and typically inedible raw materials into more useful, shelf-stable and palatable foods or potable beverages.
sentences.sContent_eng: Food processing converts relatively bulky, perishable and typically inedible raw materials into more useful, shelf-stable and palatable foods or potable beverages.
sentences.sCn: 食品加工将相对庞大的，易腐烂的，通常是不可食用的原料加工成更有用的，耐储存的和可口的食品或适于饮用的饮料。

sentences.sContent: If it does then potable water, one of the necessities of life, may become easier for many people to obtain.
sentences.sContent_eng: If it does then potable water, one of the necessities of life, may become easier for many people to obtain.
sentences.sCn: 如果确实可以的话，那么生命的必需品之一——饮用水，对多数人来说将更容易获得。

remMethod.val: pot(喝) + able → 可以喝的 → 适于饮用的

trans.tranOther: potable water is safe to drink
